title: Management of tasks and functions assigned to employees
content: Emprez allows you to assign tasks to employees according to the functions they occupy, directly from the schedule.Function: Cash desk, customer serviceTasks: Count the cash, order change ... (Up to 10 tasks per function)Tasks in text form can be entered into the different boxes, which will be displayed as-is.Employees can view their tasks and duties when accessing the schedule from their phone, from the employee portal, and from the punch.Add tasksWhen you create a new shift:Specify the tasks to be accomplished during the shift in the Tasks and Function section,Add the hours for each task in order to have greater precision in the schedule.Warning: The following format must be observed for the hours entered: HH: MM - HH: MM, name of the task.Click Modify, then close the window.Click on Save, to save the shift and its content.View the tasks assigned to your employees View the modified day by clicking on its wording in the schedule (1), The information entered in the Tasks and Functions section will appear (2).If this information has been entered by several employees, it will be displayed on the same page.Helpful?00Updated: 2 years ago Share :
